short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MagicScript helps you automate operations on App Store Connect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you feel tired of copying and pasting every time you create a new version on App Store Connect? Do you often forget metadata changes in a certain version in the past?

MagicScript is an automation tool for App Store Connect. It helps Apple developers or app operators automate operations on App Store Connect. 

MagicScript Chrome Extensionâ€™s key features include: 

- With just one click, MagicScript will execute the script and automatically copy and paste content such as 'What's New in This Version' or 'Promotional Text' from the old version in all languages to the latest version.
- It can even automatically copy content from the primary language, translate it and paste it into all languages
- Auto save all versions of Metadata such as description, keywords, what's new and promotional text before you submit the version to review.
